title: Bread prices increase by Rs. 30, other items by Rs.10: Bakery Owners’
body_lines: The price of a 450g loaf of bread will be increased by Rs. 30 from tonight, and other bakery items by Rs. 10, the All Ceylon Bakery Owners’ Association (ACBOA) said.
ACBOA President N.K. Jayawardene told the Daily Mirror that the decision was taken due to the recent fuel price increase and the increase in wheat flour.
